item.description:
Go to the members list to send Lori Larsen an e-mail or call Lori to register 203-933-2200.

The fee has gotten more expensive.
The fee is now $29.00.
Payment is to be made to Lori Larsen

It is time for another MURDER! Mooohahahahah!
Can you stand it! The crazy characters, nutty costumes, devious plans, back stabbing...

I will never forgive Donald for killing me at the last one! He will get his!!!
So put on your crazy outfits and step out of reality for a while and let go of your worries.

There will be prizes awarded for best costume, best sleuth, best actor/actress.
Comes with great food, live music and a MURDER!!

RSVPing on Meetup does NOT mean that a spot is saved for you.

Do not RSVP unless you are absolutely sure you can come and come on time as it can mess up the evening.

Everyone plays a part and as an actor you may kill or be killed. Be prepared for the unexpected.

Limited Guests,

Call Now [masked]
item.name: Coffee Talk attends Murder at Cafe @ May 16
